response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value and is worth $15,000 to us. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product at a special price of $14,000. This represents a significant saving of $1,000 compared to its original value. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a high-quality product at an attractive price. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 14000}
